com.facebook.litho

Class EventTrigger<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.EventTrigger<E>

  • public class EventTrigger<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows a top-down communication with a component and its immediate parent. The component must be able to handle OnTrigger events in order to accept an EventTrigger.
